Tips for GIT
entry.content:
If you have uncommitted changes and you want to discard them, you can use the following command to discard all changes locally:

git reset --hard HEAD

This will return your working directory and staging area to the state of the
last commit. Then you can switch to the branch to pull and pull it.

git checkout feature-branch
git pull origin feature-branch
